title: The Silver fleet
creator_credit: Gordon Wellesley, Vernon Sewell, Emeric Pressburger, Michael Powell and Archers Film Productions
brief_description: The Silver fleet is a story about occupied Holland, the Dutch resistance movement and a shipping magnate who destroys his U-boat taking himself and his Nazi mentors with it. Stars Ralph Richardson, Googie Withers and Esmond Knight.
creator_credit_for_label: Gordon Wellesley, Vernon Sewell, Emeric Pressburger, Michael Powell and Archers Film Productions
